DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect Sculptra Aesthetic cosmetic rejuvenation midface complex . The investigator plan qualitatively determine restoration midface architecture well quantitatively document change midface volume employ three-dimensional ( 3D ) surface image critically analyze volumetric tissue change . Our hypothesis patient receive Sculptra Aesthetic injection experience significant improvement facial midface volume restoration . - Measure midfacial volumetric correction Sculptra Aesthetic treatment , use three-dimensional digital surface image - Determine mean change baseline facial contour via quantitative volumetric measurement - Correlate volumetric correction clinical improvement measure Facial Lipoatrophy Panel grade system - Correlate mean volumetric change midfacial treatment area amount product use - Obtain photographs pre- post-treatment purpose provide subject visual aid course treatment - Collect safety data
DOC.brief_title: Volume Restoration Aging Midface With Sculptra Aesthetic
DOC.criteria: Age 4060 year old BMI great 18.5 less 24.9 Age less 40 year great 60 year Prior surgical nonsurgical treatment midface within past 2 year Interested seek treatment midface study period Pregnant , lactating , breast feeding Hypersensitivity polyLlactic acid , carboxymethylcellulose , mannitol Allergy lidocaine epinephrine History atopy , anaphylaxis , multiple severe allergy Current immunotherapy history autoimmune disease History active stroke myocardial infarction History active connective tissue disease History active bleeding disorder History active cancer Serious abnormalities laboratory finding Active hepatitis Active infection inflammatory process skin History risk factor hypertrophic scar keloid formation
